definition: زرق zaraqa u i (= ذرق) to drop excrement (bird); -- zaraqa u (zarq) to hit, pierce (ب ه s.o. with); to jab, bore (هـ, ه into s.o. or s.th.); to throw, hurl (هـ s.th.) زرق zarq: زرق الإبر z. al-ibar injections, injectings زرق zariqa a (zaraq) and IX to be blue زرق zaraq blue, blueness, blue color; O glaucoma (med.)
